page.title: 12CULLOMPTON HEALTH CENTRE
page.content:
1 The Health Centre was built 17 years ago and serves several other communities.It is organised by a practice manager.Doctors,nurses,school nurses,midwives work from there.The staff work 5 days a week from 0900 to 1700.A doctor is on call every night and at weekends.Some 50_60 people visit everyday.Back_ache is the most common complaint,with the 20_40 years age group being the largest group of patients.The present centre is not big enough and they hope to build a new one. If treatment cannot be given at the centre the patient goes to{Tiverton}or {Exeter}to the hospitals.
{}
